attributes.action: to use his influence and persuade the United States Government to stop illegal drone attacks on Pakistani soil. These attacks are an invasion of the sovereignty of the country and innocent civilians including women and children are being killed which is against basic human rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pakistan is an ally in the war against terrorism. If there is any indication that illegal activities are taking place, the evidence of such activities should be presented to the Government of Pakistan and actions should be sanctioned / taken by them.

These attacks are instigating the public against the US and its allies. They are also a source of friction and mistrust among the people and the Government hence destabilising the country.
